text: vēdagranthaṁ nalkappeṭṭavarēāṭ niṅṅaḷat janaṅṅaḷkk vivariccukeāṭukkaṇamennuṁ, niṅṅaḷat maṟacc vekkarutennuṁ allāhu karār vāṅṅiya sandarbhaṁ (śrad'dhikkuka) enniṭṭ avarat (vēdagranthaṁ) puṟakēāṭṭ valicceṟiyukayuṁ, tucchamāya vilaykk at viṟṟukaḷayukayumāṇ ceytat‌. avar pakaraṁ vāṅṅiyat vaḷare cītta tanne
